scenario.name: uac_rfc4028_test
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "rfc4028 timer test" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Supported: timer Session-Expires: 90 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE Min-SE: 90 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 123456 654322 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=image [auto_media_port] udptl t38 a=T38FaxVersion:0 a=T38MaxBitRate:14400 a=T38FaxRateManagement:transferredTCF

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: timer Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE Session-Expires: [$se];refresher=uac Content-Length:[len] Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 123456 654322 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=image [auto_media_port] udptl t38 a=T38FaxVersion:0 a=T38MaxBitRate:14400 a=T38FaxRateManagement:transferredTCF

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Contact: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port] [last_Call-ID:] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE [last_CSeq:] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654323 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Require: timer Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE Session-Expires: [$se];refresher=uac Content-Length:[len] Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=tester 123456 654323 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

BYE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[service]" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "rfc4028 timer test" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Supported: timer Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Session-Expires: 90 Min-SE: 90 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
